title: Large 3 bedroom 1 bath
posting_body: ['Three bedroom one bath apartment in lovely Albany Park.', ' Close to many restaurants, stores and public transportation.', ' Just rehabbed with new windows, refinished hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances including microwave and dishwasher, new kitchen counter top and cabinets, plus updated bathroom.', ' 3 bedrooms with large closets, separate living room and large dining room.', ' Unit has central heat and new air conditioning.', 'Security intercom system.', 'Laundry in building coin operated.', ' 1,100 square feet.', ' No pets.', '$1,600/month plus utilities.', '  3818 W Lawrence Ave., 2nd floor.', 'Patrick - 773-934-5886']
